public class Promise
extends Object
implements EZObject, Deliverator

Promise()
reasonable defaults
Promise(Class)
If 'optType' is non-null, the resulting promise should only be:

1) sent messages acceptable by this type (though this will not be checked before delivery),

2) forwarded to objects that are of this type (though this is not yet checked), or

3) forwarded to promises whose types are a subtype of this type (though this is not yet checked).

toString()

Promise 
 public Promise(Class optType)
If 'optType' is non-null, the resulting promise should only be:

1) sent messages acceptable by this type (though this will not be checked before delivery),

2) forwarded to objects that are of this type (though this is not yet checked), or

3) forwarded to promises whose types are a subtype of this type (though this is not yet checked).

Promise 
 public Promise()
reasonable defaults

state 
 public int state()
One of UNRESOLVED, KEPT, or BROKEN. May not return FORWARDED.

Shortens forwarding chains into a canonical state and returns the external notion of my state.

 public String toString()
